Articles.Content:
Hi guys,

 

I have KSP on steam, bought it in beta, but haven't played it much since its version 1.0, but enought to start unlocking some part in career mode.

 

I 've started the game again a few days ago, but noticed that I even though I unlocked stuff in the science window, it does not appear when I'm in build mode. For instance, on my screenshot, it clearly show that I have unlocked the radial air intakes for aircraft, but it does not appear in the aircraft build mode

 

I have no mods, and never installed any

 

Version: 1.2.0.1586

scrrens:

http://hpics.li/b488432

http://hpics.li/05aff80

http://hpics.li/b5187bd

 

I wish I could send you my log file, but I can't find how to upload it...

Edited October 28, 2016 by Skem

I sort of have similar issue. However I do not think this is a problem. When it updated, It showed the unlocked parts that were locked, I looked at newer save files and realize that the part that was unlocked was not at that spot but into a newer spot. I am not sure if this will help but look for the radial intake or other parts at  other science modes that you have not unlocked.

Hi @Skem, it looks like you're using an old save, some aero parts have been moved to different nodes over the last few updates.

The radial intake is now in the Aerodynamics node, so you'll have to unlock it again.

This issue won't appear in a new save.
